Segment.name: SPA
Segment.comment: To indicate the details and status of a product or product activity

Field.name: StatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: ProductDescriptionCode
Field.comment: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about a product characteristic

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SPA02 or SPA03 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SPA04 or SPA05 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0910
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SPA09 or SPA10 is present, then the other is required.
